definition: abbr. for Heilongjiang province 黑龍江|黑龙江[Hei1 long2 jiang1]

sentences.english: Perennial ryegrass carpet lawn soil-less cultivation is of attractive and broad prospect.
sentences.chinese: 多年生黑麦草无土栽培技术具有十分广阔的发展前景。

sentences.english: Others issued currencies linked to the price of rye.
sentences.chinese: 其他州的货币与黑麦价格挂钩。

sentences.english: Some rye chromosome arms were observed more frequently than the others in translocations.
sentences.chinese: 不同的黑麦染色体臂参与易位的频率不同。

sentences.english: Rye of Dongmu No. 70 has wide adaptation in the North - West Region.
sentences.chinese: 冬牧70黑麦在西北地区有广泛的适宜性。

sentences.english: Sing a song of sixpence a pocket full of rye.
sentences.chinese: 唱一支六便士之歌，满口袋的黑麦。

sentences.english: The fermentation of lactic acid by rye bran flour was studied here.
sentences.chinese: 最后，论文对黑麦麸皮生粉乳酸发酵进行了研究。

sentences.english: So, the ryegrass could not remediate heavy contaminated soil.
sentences.chinese: 因此，不适宜在重污染土壤上种植黑麦草。

sentences.english: A single rye plant can spread up to 400 miles of roots underground.
sentences.chinese: 单单一颗黑麦植物的根可以蔓延至地下400英里。

sentences.english: Old Overholt is an American straight rye whiskey.
sentences.chinese: 这是一种美国黑麦威士忌。

sentences.english: In this paper, the reciprocal cross was made between octoploid triticale and common wheat.
sentences.chinese: 本文用八倍体小黑麦与普通小麦进行正反交。

sentences.english: The suitable level of triticale hay addition in the diet of sheep was 25%.
sentences.chinese: 肉羊日粮中小黑麦干草的适宜添加水平为25%。

sentences.english: In addition, Al exclusion from root tips may play a pivotal role in Al resistance in triticale.
sentences.chinese: 根尖铝排斥机理在小黑麦耐铝性上起重要作用。

sentences.english: Rye and bourbon are examples of whiskeys.
sentences.chinese: 黑麦酒和波旁酒是两种威士忌酒。

sentences.english: And itals supplied a cytological authority for cultivated rye originated from wild rye.
sentences.chinese: 为栽培黑麦起源于野生黑麦提供了直接的细胞学证据。

sentences.english: And itals supplied a cytological authority for cultivated rye originated from wild rye.
sentences.chinese: 为栽培黑麦起源于野生黑麦提供了直接的细胞学证据。

sentences.english: Do you have also, if you don't mind, a piece of rye bread—the spitz ?
sentences.chinese: 你也有，如果你不介意，黑麦面包的一块的施皮茨？

pinyin: si1 pei4 er3 te4 xiao3 mai4

definition: grain crops other than rice and wheat
